description: Persistent identifier schemes supported by ECL/Astro Repo JSON Schema 2.0

data.name: Digital Object Identifier
data.description: Digital Object Identifier; a character string used to uniquely identify an object. A DOI name is divided into two parts, a prefix and a suffix, separated by a slash.

data.name: Bibliographic code
data.description: Astrophysics Data System bibliographic codes; a standardized 19 character identifier according to the syntax yyyyjjjjjvvvvmppppa.

data.name: The Software Package Data Exchange License ID
International Global Sample Number
data.description: International Geo Sample Number; a 9-digit alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies samples from our natural environment and related sampling features.
